title: Club Owner Bug? :(
body: I have an error that although I am the leader of my club, it shows no history of me being in it. When I go to PROFILE and CLUB, it asks me to create a club, which is weird because my club members can see me as the club owner. Anyone who can help me with this?

replies.body:
http://i.giphy.com/QwH7v7J1tBrq0.gif

I should be able to get that straightened out pretty quickly! Hit me up with the name of that club and I'll get right on it!
